SEARCH
Package textui.element

Class UnsortedListElement

java.lang.Object
textui.element.Element
textui.element.TextElement
textui.element.UnsortedListElement
public class UnsortedListElement extends TextElement
A text element that displays a list of items with bullet points. Each item is added as a single-line entry prefixed by a dash ("-"). The layout respects optional min/max height and width constraints.

    • addItem

      public UnsortedListElement addItem(String item)
      Adds an item to the unsorted list. The item is prefixed with a dash and split into words based on available width. If height or width are not explicitly set, they may be inferred from content.
      Parameters:
      item - the item text to add
      Returns:
      this element for chaining
